channel.title: CVE Feed for espocrm -- espocrm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for espocrm -- espocrm

item.title: CVE-2023-5966|2024-08-02T08:14:25.144Z -- espocrm -- espocrm
item.description: An authenticated privileged attacker could upload a specially crafted zip to the EspoCRM server in version 7.2.5, via the extension deployment form, which could lead to arbitrary PHP code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-5965|2024-08-02T08:14:25.143Z -- espocrm -- espocrm
item.description: An authenticated privileged attacker could upload a specially crafted zip to the EspoCRM server in version 7.2.5, via the update form, which could lead to arbitrary PHP code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-24818|2024-02-29T15:17:16.859Z -- espocrm -- espocrm
item.description: EspoCRM is an Open Source Customer Relationship Management software. An attacker can inject arbitrary IP or domain in "Password Change" page and redirect victim to malicious page that could lead to credential stealing or another attack. This vulnerability is fixed in 8.1.2.
